## Call.isMuted() method

Get the mute status of this side of the call.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isMuted(): boolean | undefined;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean \| undefined

- A boolean representing the muted status of the call. - `undefined` if the call state has not yet been received from the native layer.
